Package utils

Class LoadSave

java.lang.Object
utils.LoadSave
public class LoadSave extends Object
This class is focused on loading in sprite data, level data, and building levels. All file names will be stored here. The different functions of this class will be to load in the different types of data.
Author:
John Botonakis and Sean-Paul Brown

  • Method Details

    • getSpriteSheet

      public static BufferedImage getSpriteSheet(String filename)
      Returns the specified sprite atlas for use in drawing the correct image to the screen
      Parameters:
      filename - - The name of the sprite sheet that is requested
      Returns:
      - The specified image as a variable

    • getLevelData

      public static int[][] getLevelData(String level)
      Uses RGB values to generate a tiled level. Red Value sets the tile Green Value sets the enemy Blue value sets the object 50 Green Value = Skeleton 51 Green Value = Skeleton KING
      Parameters:
      level - - The path to the file containing the RGB data map for the specific level.
      Returns:
      - A 2D array that is representative of tiles making up the level

    • loadFont

      public static Font loadFont(String path, float size)
      Loads a custom font from a file. Re-Used from Botonakis_Project2
      Parameters:
      path - The path to the font file.
      size - The size of the font to be loaded.
      Returns:
      The loaded Font object.

    • getArrowImgs

      public static BufferedImage[] getArrowImgs()
      This returns an array of the sprites that will be used for Player's Arrows.
      Returns:
      an array of BufferedImages containing all the sprites

    • getSkeletons

      public static List<Skeleton> getSkeletons(String level)
      This method gets all of the Skeletons contained in a specific level inside of a List
      Parameters:
      level - - the level to get the Skeletons from
      Returns:
      a List containing all Skeletons from that level

    • getSkeletonKings

      public static List<SkeletonKing> getSkeletonKings(String level)
      This method gets all of the Skeleton King contained in a specific level inside of a List
      Parameters:
      level - - the level to get the Skeleton King from
      Returns:
      a List containing all Skeleton Kings from that level
